casebody.head_matter:
Larkin Appeal.
Argued October 4, 1963.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused April 20, 1964; second petition for reargument refused May 22, 1964.
March 17, 1964:
Donald M. Miller, with him Miller, Buterbaugh and Cope, for appellants.
Joseph N. Mach, with him Ralph L. Q-essler, for appellee.
